title: FS: Group of (8) T212 1910 Obak 150 backs
author: rhettyeakley

posts.post_title: FS: Group of (8) T212 1910 Obak 150 backs
posts.post_content:
I have (8) 150 backed 1910 Obak cards currently available. There are only 40 cards in this very tough subset. Seven of the eight are SGC graded, and I will list the ad slogan on back following the players for those that may be trying for one of each slogan saying...

-William Fisher, Vernon SGC 30 "Perfect Flavor" $150
-Jud Smith, LA SGC 30 "Scientifically Blended" $150
-Pop Dillon, LA SGC 20 "Paper Crimped" **Wet sheet transfer** (see back scan below)**  SOLD, Thanks Ray! 
-Bill Steen, Portland SGC 20 ""Clean-Pure" $125
-George Ort, Portland SGC 10 "Instantly Popular" (clean back and nice for the grade) $99
-Harry Stewart, SF SGC 10 "Nothing Like Them" (no back damage just deep creasing) $99
-Frank? Manush, Oakland "High Quality" SGC Aut (looks short t-to-b but it doesn't appear trimmed, factory short?) $99
-William Fisher, Vernon (raw) "Immensely Popular" -nice card with little scrape on back (see scan)) $130

Prices are shipped. Email me at [url]rhettyeakley@netzero.com[/url] if you are interested.
-Rhett
